item.title: Using Coder.com With Hugo
item.description: I hate having to setup my development environment over and over again. Today I am going to show you how to set it up once. Along with my theme of free resources, Coder.com is perfect for coding anywhere on anything. Installing Hugo on Coder.com Run this command in the terminal go get -u github.com/gohugoio/hugo Go to root/go/src/github.com/gohugoio/hugo and run a build command. Once this is done copy the hugo binary to /usr/local/bin
